The holy sister's lamentation: An elegy to the pious memory of Mr. Henry C--nish, a late Presbyterian teacher in Bisiter in Oxfordshire, who died December the 18th, 1698.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for the author in B----r, London, : [1669?]
Caption title. Date of publication suggested by Wing (CD-ROM, 1996). Henry C--nish = Henry Cornish. Text within heavy black mourning border. Single column of text, initial, marginal notes. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
